${ModID}:UltimatePower.NAME: Ultimate Power
DESCRIPTIONS: You are Very Cool and Strong.

${ModID}:PetrificationPower.NAME: Petrification
DESCRIPTIONS: If #yPetrification is #b{0} or higher at the start of your turn, remove all #yPetrification, lose #b{1} temporary #yStrength, lose #b{2} temporary #yDexterity, and you cannot draw cards this turn.

${ModID}:PetrifyingGazePower.NAME: Petrifying Gaze
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal damage or apply a debuff to this enemy, gain #b1 #yPetrification.

${ModID}:PetrifyingTouchPower.NAME: Petrifying Touch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, gain #b1 #yPetrification.

${ModID}:GainDexterityPower.NAME: Gain Dexterity
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of its turn, gains #b{0} #yDexterity.

${ModID}:AvertYourGazePower.NAME: Avert Your Gaze
DESCRIPTIONS: You do not gain #yPetrification from dealing damage or applying debuffs this turn
